segments.text: I notice the woman drying the plate, and it’s like she’s in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s so focused on her task that she’s completely unaware of everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and I’m just waiting for her to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s standing there, it’s like she’s in her own little bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice the water or the kids behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just polishing that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while the kitchen is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading everywhere, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be the most oblivious person I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s ignoring everything is really frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR
